1.name: bulbasaur
1.desc: While it is young, it uses the nutrients that are stored in the seeds on its back in order to grow.

2.name: ivysaur
2.desc: The bulb on its back grows as it absorbs nutrients. The bulb gives off a pleasant aroma when it blooms.

3.name: venusaur
3.desc: As it warms it self and absorbs the sunlight, its flower petals release a pleasant fragrance.

4.name: charmander
4.desc: If it's healthy, the flame on the tip of its tail will burn vigor ously, even if it gets a bit wet.

5.name: charmeleon
5.desc: If it becomes agitated during battle, it spouts intense flames, incinerating its surroundings.

6.name: charizard
6.desc: It uses its wings to fly high. The temperature of its fire increases as it gains exper ience in battle.

7.name: squirtle
7.desc: When it feels threatened, it draws its legs inside its shell and sprays water from its mouth.

8.name: wartortle
8.desc: Its long, furry tail is a symbol of longevity, making it quite popular among older people.

9.name: blastoise
9.desc: It firmly plants its feet on the ground before shooting water from the jets on its back.

10.name: caterpie
10.desc: For protection, it releases a horri ble stench from the antenna on its head to drive away enemies.

11.name: metapod
11.desc: This is its pre- evolved form. At this stage, it can only harden, so it remains motionless to avoid attack.

12.name: butterfree
12.desc: It flits from flower to flower, collecting honey. It can even identify distant flowers in bloom.

13.name: weedle
13.desc: The barb on top of its head secretes a strong poison. It uses this toxic barb to protect itself.

14.name: kakuna
14.desc: Nearly incapable of movement, it leans against stout trees while waiting for its evolution.

15.name: beedrill
15.desc: It has three poison barbs. The barb on its tail secretes the most powerful poison.

16.name: pidgey
16.desc: It rapidly flaps its wings in the grass, stirring up a dust cloud that drives insect prey out into the open.

17.name: pidgeotto
17.desc: It slowly flies in a circular pat tern, all the while keeping a sharp lookout for prey.

18.name: pidgeot
18.desc: Its outstanding vision allows it to spot splashing MAGIKARP, even while flying at 3300 feet.

19.name: rattata
19.desc: Living wherever there is food available, it ceaselessly scav enges for edibles the entire day.

20.name: raticate
20.desc: Its whiskers help it to maintain balance. Its fangs never stop grow ing, so it gnaws to pare them down.

21.name: spearow
21.desc: Very protective of its territory, it flaps its short wings busily to dart around at high speed.

22.name: fearow
22.desc: It uses its long beak to attack. It has a surprisingly long reach, so it must be treated with caution.

23.name: ekans
23.desc: It flutters the tip of its tongue to seek out the scent of prey, then swallows the prey whole.

24.name: arbok
24.desc: To intimidate foes, it spreads its chest wide and makes eerie sounds by expelling air from its mouth.

25.name: pikachu
25.desc: When it is anger ed, it immediately discharges the energy stored in the pouches in its cheeks.

26.name: raichu
26.desc: If the electric pouches in its cheeks become fully charged, both ears will stand straight up.

27.name: sandshrew
27.desc: It prefers dry, sandy places because it uses the sand to protect itself when threatened.

28.name: sandslash
28.desc: Adept at climbing trees, it rolls into a spiny ball, then attacks its enemies from above.

29.name: nidoran-f
29.desc: Small and very docile, it pro tects itself with its small, poison ous horn when attacked.

30.name: nidorina
30.desc: It has a docile nature. If it is threatened with attack, it raises the barbs that are all over its body.

31.name: nidoqueen
31.desc: The hard scales that cover its strong body serve as excellent protection from any attack.

32.name: nidoran-m
32.desc: It constantly moves its large ears in many directions in order to detect danger right away.

33.name: nidorino
33.desc: It raises its big ears to check its surroundings. If it senses any thing, it attacks immediately.

34.name: nidoking
34.desc: It uses its thick arms, legs and tail to attack forcefully. Melee combat is its specialty.

35.name: clefairy
35.desc: Though rarely seen, it becomes easier to spot, for some reason, on the night of a  full moon.

36.name: clefable
36.desc: Said to live in quiet, remote mountains, this type of fairy has a strong aversion to being seen.

37.name: vulpix
37.desc: As its body grows larger, its six warm tails become more beautiful, with a more luxur ious coat of fur.

38.name: ninetales
38.desc: It is said to live a thousand years, and each of its tails is loaded with supernatural powers.

39.name: jigglypuff
39.desc: It rolls its cute eyes as it sings a soothing lullaby. Its gentle song puts anyone who hears it to sleep.

40.name: wigglytuff
40.desc: The rich, fluffy fur that covers its body feels so good that anyone who feels it can't stop touching it.

41.name: zubat
41.desc: While flying, it constantly emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth to check its sur roundings.

42.name: golbat
42.desc: When it plunges its fangs into its prey, it instantly draws and gulps down more than ten ounces of blood.

43.name: oddish
43.desc: During the day, it stays in the cold underground to avoid the sun. It grows by bath ing in moonlight.

44.name: gloom
44.desc: The smell from its drool-like syrup and the pollen on its petals is so bad, it may make opponents faint.

45.name: vileplume
45.desc: It has the world's largest petals. With every step, the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.

46.name: paras
46.desc: The tochukaso growing on this POKéMON's back orders it to extract juice from tree trunks.

47.name: parasect
47.desc: When nothing's left to extract from the bug, the mushrooms on its back leave spores on the bug's egg.

48.name: venonat
48.desc: The small bugs it eats appear only at night, so it sleeps in a hole in a tree until night falls.

49.name: venomoth
49.desc: The powder on its wings is poisonous if it is dark in color. If it is light, it causes paralysis.

50.name: diglett
50.desc: If a DIGLETT DIGS through a field, it leaves the soil perfectly tilled and ideal for planting crops.

51.name: dugtrio
51.desc: These DIGLETT triplets dig over 60 miles below sea level. No one knows what it's like underground.

52.name: meowth
52.desc: It loves anything that shines. It especially adores coins that it picks up and se cretly hoards.

53.name: persian
53.desc: Behind its lithe, elegant appearance lies a barbaric side. It will tear apart its prey on a mere whim.

54.name: psyduck
54.desc: The only time it can use its psy chic power is when its sleeping brain cells happen to wake.

55.name: golduck
55.desc: It swims grace fully along on the quiet, slow-moving rivers and lakes of which it is so fond.

56.name: mankey
56.desc: It lives in groups in the treetops. If it loses sight of its group, it becomes infuriated by its loneliness.

57.name: primeape
57.desc: It will beat up anyone who makes it mad, even if it has to chase them until the end of the world.

58.name: growlithe
58.desc: It controls a big territory. If it detects an unknown smell, it roars loudly to force out the intruder.

59.name: arcanine
59.desc: An ancient picture scroll shows that people were attracted to its movement as it ran through prairies.

60.name: poliwag
60.desc: The swirl on its belly is its insides showing through the skin. It looks clearer after it eats.

61.name: poliwhirl
61.desc: Though it is skilled at walk ing, it prefers to live underwater where there is less danger.

62.name: poliwrath
62.desc: It can use its well-developed arms and legs to run on the surface of the water for a split second.

63.name: abra
63.desc: It hypnotizes itself so that it can teleport away when it senses danger, even if it is asleep.

64.name: kadabra
64.desc: When it closes its eyes, twice as many alpha parti cles come out of the surface of its body.

65.name: alakazam
65.desc: It has an IQ of 5000. It calcu lates many things in order to gain the edge in every battle.

66.name: machop
66.desc: It loves to work out and build its muscles. It is never satisfied, even if it trains hard all day long.

67.name: machoke
67.desc: This tough POKéMON always stays in the zone. Its muscles become thicker after every battle.

68.name: machamp
68.desc: With four arms that react more quickly than it can think, it can execute many punches at once.

69.name: bellsprout
69.desc: If it notices anything that moves, it immediately flings its vine at the object.

70.name: weepinbell
70.desc: When it's hungry, it swings its razor-sharp leaves, slicing up any unlucky object nearby for food.

71.name: victreebel
71.desc: ACID that has dis solved many prey becomes sweeter, making it even more effective at attracting prey.

72.name: tentacool
72.desc: As it floats along on the waves, it uses its toxic feelers to stab anything it touches.

73.name: tentacruel
73.desc: When its 80 feel ers absorb water, it stretches to become like a net to entangle its prey.

74.name: geodude
74.desc: Proud of their sturdy bodies, they bash against each other in a contest to prove whose is harder.

75.name: graveler
75.desc: A slow walker, it rolls to move. It pays no attention to any object that happens to be in its path.

76.name: golem
76.desc: Its rock-like body is so durable, even high-powered dynamite blasts fail to scratch its rugged hide.

77.name: ponyta
77.desc: Training by jumping over grass that grows longer every day has made it a world-class jumper.

78.name: rapidash
78.desc: With incredible acceleration, it reaches its top speed of 150 mph after running just ten steps.

79.name: slowpoke
79.desc: It lazes vacantly near water. If something bites its tail, it won't even notice for a whole day.

80.name: slowbro
80.desc: An attached SHELLDER won't let go because of the tasty flavor that oozes out of its tail.

81.name: magnemite
81.desc: The electricity emitted by the units on each side of its body cause it to become a strong magnet.

82.name: magneton
82.desc: When many MAGNETON gather together, the resulting magnetic storm disrupts radio waves.

83.name: farfetchd
83.desc: In order to pre vent their extinction, more people have made an effort to breed these POKéMON.

84.name: doduo
84.desc: It lives on a grassy plain where it can see a long way. If it sees an enemy, it runs away at 60 mph.

85.name: dodrio
85.desc: If one of the heads gets to eat, the others will be satisfied, too, and they will stop squabbling.

86.name: seel
86.desc: The light blue fur that covers it keeps it protected against the cold. It loves iceberg- filled oceans.

87.name: dewgong
87.desc: It sleeps under shallow ocean waters during the day, then looks for food at night when it's cold.

88.name: grimer
88.desc: When two of these POKéMON's bodies are combined together, new poisons are created.

89.name: muk
89.desc: As it moves, a very strong poison leaks from it, making the ground there barren for three years.

90.name: shellder
90.desc: Clamping on to an opponent reveals its vulnerable parts, so it uses this move only as a last resort.

91.name: cloyster
91.desc: Even a missile can't break the spikes it uses to stab opponents. They're even hard er than its shell.

92.name: gastly
92.desc: It wraps its op ponent in its gas- like body, slowly weakening its prey by poisoning it through the skin.

93.name: haunter
93.desc: It hides in the dark, planning to take the life of the next living thing that wanders close by.

94.name: gengar
94.desc: Hiding in people's shadows at night, it absorbs their heat. The chill it causes makes the victims shake.

95.name: onix
95.desc: As it digs through the ground, it absorbs many hard objects. This is what makes its body so solid.

96.name: drowzee
96.desc: When it twitches its nose, it can tell where someone is sleeping and what that person is dreaming about.

97.name: hypno
97.desc: The longer it swings its pendulum, the longer the effects of its hypnosis last.

98.name: krabby
98.desc: If it is unable to find food, it will absorb nutrients by swallowing a mouthful of sand.

99.name: kingler
99.desc: Its oversized claw is very powerful, but when it's not in battle, the claw just gets in the way.

100.name: voltorb
100.desc: During the study of this POKéMON, it was discovered that its compo nents are not found in nature.

101.name: electrode
101.desc: The more energy it charges up, the faster it gets. But this also makes it more likely to explode.

102.name: exeggcute
102.desc: If even one is separated from the group, the energy bond between the six will make them rejoin instantly.

103.name: exeggutor
103.desc: Living in a good environment makes it grow lots of heads. A head that drops off becomes an EXEGGCUTE.

104.name: cubone
104.desc: It lost its mother after its birth. It wears its mother's skull, never revealing its true face.

105.name: marowak
105.desc: It collects bones from an unknown place. A MAROWAK graveyard exists somewhere in the world, rumors say.

106.name: hitmonlee
106.desc: It is also called the Kick Master. It uses its elastic legs to execute every known kick.

107.name: hitmonchan
107.desc: To increase the strength of all its punch moves, it spins its arms just before making contact.

108.name: lickitung
108.desc: It has a tongue that is over 6’6’’ long. It uses this long tongue to lick its body clean.

109.name: koffing
109.desc: If one gets close enough to it when it expels poison ous gas, the gas swirling inside it can be seen.

110.name: weezing
110.desc: When it inhales poisonous gases from garbage, its body expands, and its insides smell much worse.

111.name: rhyhorn
111.desc: It can remember only one thing at a time. Once it starts rushing, it forgets why it started.

112.name: rhydon
112.desc: By lightly spin ning its drill- like horn, it can easily shatter even a diamond in the rough.

113.name: chansey
113.desc: People try to catch it for its extremely nutritious eggs, but it rarely can be found.

114.name: tangela
114.desc: During battle, it constantly moves the vines that cover its body in order to annoy its opponent.

115.name: kangaskhan
115.desc: To avoid crushing the baby it carries in its pouch, it always sleeps standing up.

116.name: horsea
116.desc: When they're in a safe location, they can be seen playfully tangling their tails together.

117.name: seadra
117.desc: The male raises the young. If it is approached, it uses its toxic spikes to fend off the intruder.

118.name: goldeen
118.desc: During spawning season, they swim gracefully in the water, searching for their perfect mate.

119.name: seaking
119.desc: Using its horn, it bores holes in riverbed boulders, making nests to prevent its eggs from washing away.

120.name: staryu
120.desc: Even if its body is torn, it can regenerate as long as the glowing central core re mains intact.

121.name: starmie
121.desc: It is said that it uses the seven- colored core of its body to send electric waves into outer space.

122.name: mr-mime
122.desc: It uses the mysterious power it has in its fingers to solidify air into an invisible wall.

123.name: scyther
123.desc: It's very proud of its speed. It moves so fast that its opponent does not even know what knocked it down.

124.name: jynx
124.desc: It has several different cry pat terns, each of which seems to have its own meaning.

125.name: electabuzz
125.desc: When two ELECTABUZZ touch, they control the electric currents to communicate their feelings.

126.name: magmar
126.desc: It moves more frequently in hot areas. It can heal itself by dipping its wound into lava.

127.name: pinsir
127.desc: When the tempera ture drops at night, it sleeps on treetops or among roots where it is well hidden.

128.name: tauros
128.desc: These violent POKéMON fight with other mem bers of their herd in order to prove their strength.

129.name: magikarp
129.desc: This weak and pathetic POKéMON gets easily pushed along rivers when there are strong currents.

130.name: gyarados
130.desc: They say that during past wars, GYARADOS would appear and leave blazing ruins in its wake.

131.name: lapras
131.desc: This gentle POKéMON loves to give people rides and provides a ve ry comfortable way to get around.

132.name: ditto
132.desc: When it encount ers another DITTO, it will move faster than normal to duplicate that opponent exactly.

133.name: eevee
133.desc: Its ability to evolve into many forms allows it to adapt smoothly and perfectly to any environment.

134.name: vaporeon
134.desc: As it uses the fins on the tip of its tail to swim, it blends with the water perfectly.

135.name: jolteon
135.desc: The negatively charged ions generated in its fur create a constant sparking noise.

136.name: flareon
136.desc: Once it has stored up enough heat, this POKéMON's body temperature can reach up to 1700 degrees.

137.name: porygon
137.desc: An artificial POKéMON created due to extensive research, it can perform only what is in its program.

138.name: omanyte
138.desc: In prehistoric times, it swam on the sea floor, eating plankton. Its fossils are sometimes found.

139.name: omastar
139.desc: Its heavy shell allowed it to reach only nearby food. This could be the reason it is extinct.

140.name: kabuto
140.desc: Three hundred million years ago, it hid on the sea floor. It also has eyes on its back that glow.

141.name: kabutops
141.desc: With sharp claws, this ferocious, ancient POKéMON rips apart prey and sucks their body fluids.

142.name: aerodactyl
142.desc: This vicious POKé MON is said to have flown in an cient skies while shrieking high- pitched cries.

143.name: snorlax
143.desc: This POKéMON's stomach is so strong, even eating moldy or rotten food will not affect it.

144.name: articuno
144.desc: Legendary bird POKéMON. As it flies through the sky, it cools the air, causing snow to fall.

145.name: zapdos
145.desc: This legendary bird POKéMON is said to appear only when a thun dercloud parts into two halves.

146.name: moltres
146.desc: Legendary bird POKéMON. It is said to migrate from the south along with the spring.

147.name: dratini
147.desc: It sheds many lay ers of skin as it grows larger. Dur ing this process, it is protected by a rapid waterfall.

148.name: dragonair
148.desc: Its crystalline orbs appear to give this POKéMON the power to freely control the weather.

149.name: dragonite
149.desc: It is said that somewhere in the ocean lies an island where these gather. Only they live there.

150.name: mewtwo
150.desc: Said to rest qui etly in an undiscovered cave, this POKéMON was created solely for battling.

151.name: mew
151.desc: Because it can learn any move, some people began research to see if it is the ancestor of all POKéMON.
